# The `DisableLIRP` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Options to disable <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> Idiom Recognize, which can be shared with other passes. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Options to disable <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> Idiom Recognize, which can be shared with other passes.
